title: fix: adjust layer rendering order to ensure components appear on top
description: Adjust the rendering order of layers to ensure components appear on top.

title: The table section needs an update to include the latest libraries
description: Updates the table section in the README to include the latest libraries.

title: refactor(NormalComponent): simplify manual placement condition checks && test: reorganize manual edit conflict warning tests
description: Refactors the condition checks for manual placement in the `NormalComponent` class, and reorganizes the manual edit conflict warning tests.

title: Fix flaky test
description: Fix flaky test for schematic trace overlap with manufacturer label.

title: feat: New DRC rule for components out of board
description: Introduces a new DRC rule to check if PCB components are out of the board boundary.

title: pointToSegmentClosestPoint and distSq functions
description: Adds two utility functions: `distSq` to calculate the squared distance between two points, and `pointToSegmentClosestPoint` to find the closest point on a line segment to a given point.

title: chore: remove additional comment
description: Remove additional console log statement.

title: feat(SearchComponent): add autofocus prop to control input focus
description: Add an `autofocus` prop to the `SearchComponent` to control whether the search input should be focused on component mount.

title: Show "No packages" when we don't have packages
description: Add a message to indicate when there are no packages available or starred packages.

title: Stop sending events to posthog during development
description: Stops sending events to Posthog during development.

title: Change syntax highlighting for markdown to tsx
description: Change syntax highlighting for markdown from TypeScript to TSX.

title: fix: readme code syntax highlight
description: Fix the code syntax highlighting in the README file

title: fix(EditorNav): simplify save logic by removing unused props
description: Simplifies the save logic in the EditorNav component by removing unused props.

title: Update fake to have /order_quotes/create accept circuit_json & test
description: Update the fake API to accept either `circuit_json` or `package_release_id` when creating an order quote.

title: feat(editor): add beta edit option and enhance manual edits import
description: Introduce a beta edit option in the dropdown menu for package editing, refactor the manual edits import functionality to support multiple files and improve error handling, and streamline state management in the CodeAndPreview component for better maintainability and performance.

title: feature: Settings view now allows changing visibility and deleting the package
description: The pull request adds a settings view that allows changing the visibility and deleting the package.

title: Stripe checkout added and session token being passed to runframe
description: Adds Stripe checkout functionality and passes session token to runframe

title: Add markdown support
description: Add support for markdown rendering in the application

title: Added syntax highlighting to the hover tooltip in code editor
description: Added syntax highlighting to the hover tooltip in the code editor.

title: feat(SearchComponent): focus input on mount to improve UX
description: Add a useRef hook to the input element and focus it on component mount to enhance user experience by immediately allowing keyboard input.

title: feat: Add star timestamp to snippets and update related logic
description: Adds a star timestamp to snippets and updates the related logic to allow sorting packages based on the most recently starred ones.

title: fix: order dialog to open
description: Fix to ensure the order dialog opens correctly.

title: Fix the overflow and tooltip ui when hovering over code components
description: Fix the overflow and tooltip UI when hovering over code components

title: Add internal user to filter out the analytics from posthog
description: Add internal user to filter out the analytics from posthog

title: Fix/order button
description: Fixed the order button on the package header page.

title: add context menu with ability to save camera position, ability to add markers
description: Add context menu with ability to save camera position, ability to add markers

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.380
description: Update @tscircuit/core dependency to version 0.0.380

title: fix tips changing on rerender, improve tip text
description: Fix tips changing on rerender and improve tip text

title: replace alertDialog with dialog to fix the dialog closing issue when clicked outside
description: Replace `AlertDialog` with `Dialog` to fix the dialog closing issue when clicked outside.

title: Support create order_qutoue with checkout to stripe
description: Adds support for creating an order quote with checkout to Stripe.

title: Add auth tokens, setup for proxying to local registry for testing
description: Add support for authentication tokens and setup for proxying to a local registry for testing.

title: feat(PreviewEmptyState): add user tips
description: Add dynamic user tips to the PreviewEmptyState component, improving the visual layout and making the component more informative.

title: feat: `tsci config set` && refactor(clone): improve error message, author name customization
description: Introduces a new configuration option `alwaysCloneWithAuthorName` to control whether the author name is included in the cloned snippet directory by default, and improves error handling for the clone command.

title: add skeleton until the iframe is loaded
description: Add a skeleton until the iframe is loaded

title: style(css): add responsive styles for iframes and prevent horizontal overflow
description: Adds responsive styles for iframes and prevents horizontal overflow

title: fix for stitch solver connecting routes incorrectly
description: Fix for a bug in the `SingleHighDensityRouteStitchSolver` where it was connecting routes incorrectly.

title: feat: spatial-index using rbush, flatbush
description: Introduces a new spatial index implementation using rbush and flatbush libraries to optimize obstacle searching for static and dynamic obstacles.

title: Break on Stage/Node in Debugger, Adjust Quality Parameters
description: Adds a new JSON file `cn14003-nodeWithPortPoints.json` and updates the `cn1701-nodeWithPortPoints.json` file with additional details.
